alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Northern La Porte; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 12 at 8:10PM EST until November 13 at 1:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow showers. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts near 6 inches possible over northeast Berrien into western Cass counties. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and southwest Michigan. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest snowfall amounts are expected roughly along and east of US 31 in southwest Lower Michigan.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Northern La Porte; Western St. Joseph
